detail_desc: Sturdy slip in stretch microfibre with a sculpting effect on the tummy, bum and thighs. Lace cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Microfibre body with a push-up bra and gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and seat. Underwired bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps, a silicone trim at the top, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with a hook-and-eye fastening.
Knee-length dress in jersey with contrasting colour panels and a cut-out V-neck. Cap sleeves, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in patterned satin with a high waist, pleats at the top, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Sturdy microfibre briefs that hold in and shape the waist with a lined gusset and wide lace trims at the sides.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy, textured weave with wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Short wrap dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Short wrap dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in jersey crêpe with pleats at the shoulders and centre front. Double layer at the top.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in jersey crêpe with pleats at the shoulders and centre front. Double layer at the top.

Lace push-up body with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Soft, double-layered hairband with a decorative wrapover detail at the front.
Soft, double-layered hairband with a decorative wrapover detail at the front.
Soft, double-layered hairband with a decorative wrapover detail at the front.
Trainers in imitation leather with a medium-height shaft with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a medium-height shaft with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a hook and loop tab over the foot, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a double-layer shaft, lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Felted fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a double-layer shaft, lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Felted fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped key pocket at the back, ventilating mesh sections on the legs and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped key pocket at the back, ventilating mesh sections on the legs and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a soft, fine knit with a wide foldover at the top and long sleeves.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a soft, fine knit with a wide foldover at the top and long sleeves.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and fabric with a padded edge, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and fabric with a padded edge, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation suede loafers with a moccasin seam at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles (soft soles in sizes 0-1).
Fitted jersey dress with a small stand-up collar, a zip at the back and cut-out sections at the waist.
Soft slippers in jersey with a motif on the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and soles with anti-slip protectors.

Microfibre body that has a light shaping effect on the tummy and waist. Halterneck, mesh sections, a V-neck and mesh-lined triangular cups. Adjustable strap fastening at the back of the neck, and a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips. High waist with laser-cut edges, wide lace at the sides and a lined gusset.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a broderie anglaise collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a broderie anglaise collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with a rounded collar in a broderie anglaise weave, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with a rounded collar in a broderie anglaise weave, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.
Derby shoes in glittery imitation leather with satin ribbon lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Imitation leather linings with a metallic finish, canvas insoles and rubber soles.

Round-necked blouse in an airy weave with beaded embroidery at the front and down the sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs. Unlined.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Narrow belt in grained imitation leather with small studs and a large metal buckle. Width approx. 2.7 cm.
Shorts in narrow-wale corduroy with a glittery print, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with lace details, a V-neck, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a lace trim and tie-top spaghetti straps. Smocking at the back,a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Sleeveless top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a lace trim and tie-top spaghetti straps. Smocking at the back,a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a grandad collar, gathered yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a chest pocket and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in a crinkled plumeti viscose weave with embroidery at the top, a V-neck and gathered seam under the bust with a crocheted lace trim. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline with a wide flounce. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in a viscose weave with frills at the front, a small opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.

Jacket in cotton corduroy with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief and fake front pockets´with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
